entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Monday 24 April 2023
